passages.text: Hi, um, there was actually something I wanted to mention to you. [[alright]]
passages.name: start

passages.text: I walked by the sign in the square with all the identified fish counts and saw how many trumpetfish have been caught during the festival. I thought maybe it would make more sense to maybe catch diverse fish, right? We don't want to overfish trumpetfish, right? Maybe you could avoid fishing on the east shore? Or maybe you could use less squid for bait? I've heard trumpetfish are most attracted to squid.
passages.name: alright
